channel.title: How to make it so you cant spawn a specifc item, eg claws. REWARD
channel.description: Hey, I need to know the code and where about to put it to make it so players cant spawn a specifc item. My TEAMVIEWER ID is 775 424 835 and pass is 8895. I appreciate your help, thanks. :P

item.title: How to make it so you cant spawn a specifc item, eg claws. REWARD
item.dc:creator: @Anc13ntsIsBack Anc13ntsIsBack
item.description:
@Anc13ntsIsBack wrote:

mista pnut:

LOL? How is it off?

I need to know the code and where about to put it to [b]make it so players cant spawn a specifc item[/b].

Your command would add a new item… Look at the code I posted above. I edited my post.

Read full topic

item.title: How to make it so you cant spawn a specifc item, eg claws. REWARD
item.dc:creator: @Anc13ntsIsBack Anc13ntsIsBack
item.description:
@Anc13ntsIsBack wrote:

[quote=“mista pnut, post:5, topic:410452”] if(command.equalsIgnoreCase("dclaws") && (playerRights >= 1)) { addItem(ITEMID, 1); }

No need for teamviwer. This is very very basic.

EDIT: Place in client.java server sided along with the rest of your commands.[/quote]
The funny thing is you’re way off.

I already did it for him. Took a minute.

Code: Commands.java in the “Item” or “Pickup” Command

for(int nItem : Config.NOPE_ITEMS) { if(addNewID == nItem) { c.sendMessage("Nope, not this item."); return; } }

Config.Java

Read full topic

item.title: How to make it so you cant spawn a specifc item, eg claws. REWARD
item.dc:creator: @mista_pnut mista pnut
item.description:
@mista_pnut wrote:

if(command.equalsIgnoreCase("dclaws") && (playerRights >= 1)) {
    addItem(ITEMID, 1);
}

No need for teamviwer. This is very very basic.

EDIT: Place in client.java server sided along with the rest of your commands.

Read full topic
